com.mongodb

Class DBRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.DBRefBase
      • com.mongodb.DBRef

  • public class DBRef
extends DBRefBase
    overrides DBRefBase to understand a BSONObject representation of a reference.

    MongoDB Doc Links
